column4: people, what about an iPod that after 3 mins of playing says "impossible to determinate the kind of stream"?
run 'dmesg' and see if there are lot of I/O errors
yes, i think so, because gtkpod says something about I/O
known bug, are you running the iPod through a USB hub?
yes, i think (it's not mine, I translate for a friend who speaks oly italian...)
see if he can run it directly to a USB port on the machine
it solved similar problems for me
it seems that the ipod is working now! So probably now we have another Ubuntu addicted :)
was it the usb hub fix?
yes, now it's connected directly to an usb on the motherboard
hopefully that will be fixed in edgy but at least it works :-)
it's an issue with latest fglrx driver, it screws up 3D with radeon9000 cards
let me see if I can find back where I've found it
